message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,200,000 to me due to its unique features and the years of expertise we've poured into its development. Given its immense worth and the benefits it offers, I am confident it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its true market value and the importance it holds for us, I am extending an offer to sell this product to you for $950,000. I believe this price reflects the quality and potential of the product while also providing you with a substantial saving. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to consider this opportunity.
